name: sliced in sauce
title: Vital Balance Senior · sliced in sauce · Beef & carrots
description: Vital Balance sliced in sauce Beef & carrots Senior 7+

mainInformation.origin: You can find information about the origin on the packaging in the store.

petFoodBasicInformation.composition: Composition: Meat and animal derivatives (of which beef 5%), Vegetable protein extracts, Fish and fish derivatives, Oils and fats, Derivatives of vegetable origin, minerals, Various sugars, Vegetables (0.6% dehydrated carrots, equivalent to 5.4% carrots).
petFoodBasicInformation.additives: Additives: Nutritional additives: IU/kg: Vit A: 1340; Vit D3: 185; Vit E: 310; mg/kg: Iron(II) sulphate monohydrate: (Fe: 16); Calcium iodate anhydrous: (I: 0.47); Copper(II) sulphate pentahydrate: (Cu:1.2); Manganous sulphate monohydrate: (Mn:2.2); Zinc sulphate monohydrate: (Zn:23); taurine: 610. Flavourings.

usageInformation.additionalInformation: With the delicious and nutritious PURINA VITAL BALANCE meals, developed by vets & nutritionists, you can be sure that your cat receives all the nutrients it needs every day for a visible sense of well-being. Completely &balanced recipes specially developed for cats over 7 years

petFoodStorageInformation.instructions: Feeding guide: For an average senior cat of 4 kg, feed 2-3 pouches per day. The recommended daily amounts should be adjusted to weather conditions, cat’s level of activity and its physical condition. Serve at room temperature. Clean, fresh water should always be available. Alternatively, you can replace 1 pouch by 20 g of kibbles of Vital Balance Senior Cat Dry.

otherInformation.legalDesignation: Complete pet food for cats aged 7 years and over
otherInformation.distributorStreetAndNumber: (CH) Nestlé Suisse S.A., Nestlé Purina PetCare, CP 352, CH-1800 Vevey

remarks.value: Keep pet food in a cool and dry place.

mainSpecificities.code: Food needs per day in bowls

mainSpecificities.value: Die empfohlenen täglichen Mengen sollten sich je nach Wetter,  dem Aktivitätslevel der Katze und ihrem physischen Allgemeinzustand richten. Sauberes,  frisches Trinkwasser sollte jederzeit zur Verfügung stehen.
